campaign-creation.custom-landing-page_too_long: Please choose a shorter text to display on the starting page.
campaign-creation.external-user-id-required: Please specify the type of external user ID which the participants will be required to fill when starting the customised test.
campaign-creation.owner_not_in_organization: Please select a member of your organization.
campaign-creation.purpose-required: Please select the purpose of your campaign: assess participants or collect their profiles.
campaign-creation.target-profile-required: Please select a customised test for your campaign.

csv-import.property-not-uniq: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must be unique within the file.

api-error-messages.default: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

edit-student-number.student-number-exists: The student number entered is already used by {firstName} {lastName}

api-error-messages.global: An error occurred. Please try again later.

student-csv-import.bad-csv-format: The file must be in csv format with comma or semicolon separator.
student-csv-import.field-date-format: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must be in the format dd/mm/yyyy.
student-csv-import.field-email-format: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must be a valid email address.
student-csv-import.field-length: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must contain {limit} characters.
student-csv-import.field-max-length: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must contain less than {limit} characters.
student-csv-import.field-min-length: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must contain at least {limit} characters.
student-csv-import.header-unknown: Column headers must be identical to the ones on the template.
student-csv-import.identifier-unique: Row {line} : The field “{field}” of this row is repeated several times within the file.
student-csv-import.insee-code-invalid: Row {line} : The field “{field}” is not in the INSEE format.
student-csv-import.payload-too-large: The file must be less than {maxSize}MB.
student-csv-import.student-number-format: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must not contain any special characters.
student-csv-import.student-number-unique: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must be unique within the file.

student-password-reset.organization-learner-does-not-belong-to-: Some of the selected students are no longer part of this organisation.
student-password-reset.organization-learner-without-username-er: Some of the selected students no longer have a username. Please refresh this page.
student-password-reset.user-does-not-belong-to-organization-err: You no longer have the rights for this organisation.

student-xml-import.birth-city-code-required-for-french-stud: Student with {nationalStudentId} INE has no birth city code filled out. This field is mandatory for each student born in France.
student-xml-import.birthdate-required: Student with {nationalStudentId} INE has no date of birth filled out. This field is mandatory for each student.
student-xml-import.empty: Each student must have an INE and a class.
student-xml-import.ine-required: INE is mandatory for each student.
student-xml-import.ine-unique: The INE {nationalStudentId} is repeated several times within the file for several students.
student-xml-import.invalid-birthdate-format: Student with {nationalStudentId} INE has the wrong date of birth format. It must be in 'DD/MM/YYYY' format.
student-xml-import.invalid-file: File does not match the requirements.
student-xml-import.payload-too-large: The file must be less than {maxSize}MB.
student-xml-import.sex-code-required: Student with {nationalStudentId} INE has no sex code filled out. This field is mandatory for each student.
student-xml-import.uai-mismatched: The UAI of your SIECLE file does not match your school.

application.description: The platform dedicated to educational assessment and monitoring. Pix Orga lets you launch an assessment campaign or collect Pix profiles, track the progress of your students or learners in a campaign, or access their results.

certification.message: ''Certifications :'' n’oubliez pas de '<'a href={documentationLink} class="{linkClasses}" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"'>'finaliser les sessions dans Pix Certif'' puis de télécharger les attestations ici via l'onglet “Certifications” avant la rentrée {year}.

import.message: The administrator can download certification results and '<'a href="/import-participants" class="{linkClasses}"'>'import'' the students database to create back-to-school campaigns by year level. '<'a href={documentationLink} class="{linkClasses}" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"'>'Learn more''

language-availability.message: Your language is not yet available on Pix Orga. For your convenience, the application will be presented in English. The entire Pix team is working to add your language.

over-capacity.message: Please note that you are using more seats than your total capacity.

participants-average-results.title: Average result
participants-average-results.information: Find here the average results of your campaign. This includes all the participants who have completed their customised test and sent their results.

participants-average-stages.title: Average rating
participants-average-stages.information: Find here the average rating of your campaign. This includes all the participants who have completed their customised test and sent their results.

participants-count.title: Total participants
participants-count.information: Find here the total number of participations in your campaign. This includes all the participants who have entered the code and started their customised test or submitted their profile.

place-info.details: with at least one participation in a campaign.
place-info.link: Free a place from the "Participants" tab.

submitted-count.title: Submitted results
submitted-count.information: Find here the results submitted by your participants. This includes all the participants who have finished and clicked on the button "Submit my results" or "Submit my profile".

participants-by-mastery-percentage.title: Distribution of participants grouped by success rate
participants-by-mastery-percentage.label-a11y: From {from, number, ::percent} to {to, number, ::percent}: {count, plural, =0 {0 participant} =1 {1 participant} other {{count, number} participants}}
participants-by-mastery-percentage.loader: Loading participants grouped by success rates

participants-by-stage.title: Distribution of participants grouped by success rate
participants-by-stage.loader: Loading and sorting the participants grouped by success rates
participants-by-stage.participants: {count, plural, =0 {0 participants} =1 {1 participant} other {{count, number} participants}}

labels-a11y.completed: {count, plural, =0 {0 participants} =1 {1 participant} other {{count, number} participants}} with pending results
labels-a11y.shared: {count, plural, =0 {0 participants} =1 {1 participant} other {{count, number} participants}} with submitted results
labels-a11y.shared-profile: {count, plural, =0 {0 participants} =1 {1 participant} other {{count, number} participants}} with submitted profiles
labels-a11y.started: {count, plural, =0 {0 participants} =1 {1 participant} other {{count, number} participants}} in progress

labels-legend.completed-assessment-tooltip: Pending results: These participants have finished their customised test but haven’t submitted their results yet.
labels-legend.completed-profile-tooltip: Pending profiles: These participants haven’t submitted their profiles yet.
labels-legend.shared-profile-tooltip: Submitted profiles: These participants have submitted their profiles.
labels-legend.shared-tooltip: Submitted results: These participants have finished their customised test and submitted their results.
labels-legend.started-tooltip: In progress: These participants haven’t finished their customised test yet.

api-error-messages.bad-request-error: The data entered was not in the correct format.
api-error-messages.gateway-timeout-error: The service is being slow. Please try again later.
api-error-messages.internal-server-error: An error occurred, our teams are working on finding a solution. Please try again later.
api-error-messages.login-unauthorized-error: There was an error in the email address or password entered.
api-error-messages.login-user-blocked-error: Your account has reached the maximum number of failed login attempts and has been temporarily blocked. Please '<'a href="{url}"'>'contact us'' to unblock it.
api-error-messages.login-user-temporary-blocked-error: You have reached too many failed login attempts. Please try again later or '<'a href="{url}"'>'reset your password here''.

action.select-page-size: Select the number of items by page

result.accessibility-description: Results obtained = {percentage, number, ::percent},that is success rate {stage} of {totalStage}

certificability-tooltip.aria-label: How to know if a participant is eligible for certification and what does it mean?
certificability-tooltip.content: To be eligible for certification, the participant must have achieved level 1 in at least 5 different competences.
certificability-tooltip.from-collect-notice: their Pix profile needs to be submitted through a profile collection campaign. If the participant has already submitted their profile, the date and status of the last submission are displayed.
certificability-tooltip.from-compute-certificability: This status is updated both automatically (every 24 hours) and during profile collection campaigns.

deletion-modal.confirmation-checkbox: I confirm that I have understood the impacts of the {count} deletions

credits.number: {count, plural, =0 {0 credits} =1 {1 credit} other {{count, number} credits}}
credits.tooltip-text: The number of credits displayed is the number of credits acquired by the organisation and currently valid (regardless of their activation). For more information, please contact us at the following address: ''pro@pix.fr''

places.number: {count, plural, =0 {0 seat available} =1 {1 seat available} other {{count, number} seats available}}

status.title: Session status
status.info-text:
Students can only access missions when the session is active.'
'At the end of the session, students who are in the middle of a mission will not be disconnected.

results.label: Results
results.tooltip: ''This participant has validated'' {result, number, ::percent} ''of the competence {competence}.''

campaign.empty-state-with-copy-link: No participants yet! Share with them the following link to join this campaign.
campaign.name: Name of the campaign

delete-participation-modal.title: Delete the participation of {firstName} {lastName}?
delete-participation-modal.error: An error occurred while removing this participation.
delete-participation-modal.success: The participation has been successfully deleted
delete-participation-modal.text: You are about to delete a participation, it will no longer be visible nor included in the statistics of the campaign.

assessment-campaign-participation.shared-participation: The participant will not be able to take the test again.
assessment-campaign-participation.started-participation: The participant will be able to complete their customised test but will no longer be able to submit their results. They will also not be able to participate in the campaign again.
assessment-campaign-participation.to-share-participation: The participant will no longer be able to submit their results nor to take the test again.

profiles-collection-campaign-participati.shared-participation: The participant will no longer be able to submit their profile through this campaign.
profiles-collection-campaign-participati.to-share-participation: The participant will no longer be able to submit their profile through this campaign.

campaign-creation.title: Create a campaign

external-id-label.label: external user ID label
external-id-label.question-label: Do you need an external user ID?
external-id-label.required: The external user ID label is mandatory.

landing-page-text.label: Text to display on the starting page

campaign-creation.legal-warning: *In accordance with the French law governing computer technology and freedoms (“Informatique et Libertés”), and as data controller, please be careful not to ask for significant or identifying personal data unless it is absolutely necessary. Asking for social security numbers, as well as any sensitive data, is strictly prohibited.

assessments.info: If you choose to allow multiple submissions, the participants will be able to take the test again 4 days after and submit their results several times by re-entering the campaign code. Within Pix Orga you will find the latest participation.
assessments.question-label: Do you want to allow participants to submit their results more than once?

multiple-sendings.knowledge-elements-resettable: As part of the customised test, participants can try to improve their results by repeating all the questions in the customised test.

profiles.info: If you choose to allow multiple submissions, the participants will be able to submit their profile several times by re-entering the campaign code. Within Pix Orga you will find the latest submitted profile.
profiles.question-label: Do you want to allow participants to submit their profile more than once?

owner.title: Campaign owner
owner.info: The campaign owner, along with the organisation administrators, are the only ones who can modify or archive this campaign.
owner.label: Campaign owner

purpose.assessment-info: An assessment campaign tests participants on specific topics.
purpose.label: What is the purpose of your campaign?
purpose.profiles-collection-info: A profile collection campaign retrieves the participants’ Pix profile: their level for each competence and their pix score.
purpose.profiles-collection-info-certificability: The “Eligible for certification” status is updated automatically in the '<'a href="/eleves" class="{linkClasses}"'>'Students'' tab.

campaigns-list.no-campaign: No campaign. To start, click on 'Create a campaign'.

table.description-all-campaigns: This is the list of all the campaigns created in you Pix Orga. It includes their code, their owner name, creation date, number of participants and number of received results.
table.description-my-campaigns: This is the list of the campaigns you own. It includes their code, their creation date, number of participants and number of received results.

certifications.title: Certification results

certifications.documentation-link-notice: Follow this link to find indications on how to interpret the results:

errors.no-results: No certification results for the class {selectedDivision}.

certifications.no-students-imported-yet: In this tab, you will find the certification results and certificates of the students. You will first need to import the students database of your school.

legal-information.link-text: En savoir plus sur mes droits.

login-form.active-or-retrieve: Activate or retrieve your Pix Orga space

errors.should-change-password: You currently have a temporary password. '<'a href="{url}"'>'Reset your password here''.

status.403: Access to this Pix Orga space is limited to invited members. Each Pix Orga space is managed by an administrator specific to the organisation using it. Please contact your administrator to get invited.
status.404: There was an error in the email address or password entered.
status.409: This invitation has been already accepted or cancelled.

login-form.invitation-already-accepted: This invitation has already been accepted. Please log in or contact the administrator of your Pix Orga space.
login-form.invitation-was-cancelled: This invitation is no longer valid. Please contact the administrator of your Pix Orga space.
login-form.is-only-accessible: Pix Orga is only accessible to invited members. Please contact your Pix Orga administrator in order to be invited.

table.description: Table of students, sorted by name.You can edit the student's number through a menu in an additional column

leave-organization.title: Leave this Pix Orga space
leave-organization.message:
Are you sure you want to leave this Pix Orga space? You will no longer have access to {organizationName}.

Your campaigns remain accessible to the rest of the team and will not be archived.

Your access to other Pix Orga spaces will not be affected.

You'll be disconnected.

change-member-role.error: An error occurred while changing this member's role.

leave-organization.error: An error has occurred while deactivating the member.
leave-organization.success: You have been successfully removed from the organisation {organizationName}. You will be disconnected from Pix Orga...

remove-membership.error: An error occurred while removing this member.
remove-membership.success: {memberFirstName} {memberLastName} has successfully been removed from your Pix Orga team.

remove-membership-modal.title: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
remove-membership-modal.message:
{memberFirstName} {memberLastName} will no longer have access to this Pix Orga space.'
'The campaigns created by this member will still be accessible to the rest of the team.

team-new.title: Invite a member
team-new.email-requirement: Enter here the email address of the member you want to invite.

errors.default: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.sending-email-to-invalid-email-address: Sending email to the address {email} failed. The sending server replied: "{errorMessage}".

status.400: The email address format is invalid.
status.404: This email address doesn't match any Pix user.
status.412: This member has already been added.
status.500: Something went wrong. Please try again.

team-new.invited-members: By clicking on the link provided in the invitation, the invited members will be able to create an account or log in with an existing Pix account.
team-new.several-email-requirement: Invite several members by separating the email addresses with commas.

success.invitation: An invitation has been sent to the email address {email}.
success.multiple-invitations: An invitation has been sent to the listed email addresses.
